record.title: PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3074
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3074 -- (House of Representatives - July 23, 2007)

[Page: H8257]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that, during consideration of H.R. 3074 pursuant to House Resolution 558, the Chair may reduce to 2 minutes the minimum time for electronic voting under clause 6 of rule XVIII and clauses 8 and 9 of rule XX.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
